chunks.text: The boy was there when the sun rose, a rod is used to catch paint salmon, the source of the huge river is the clear spring, kick the ball straight and follow through, help the woman get back to her feet, a part of tea helps to pass the evening, smokey fires lack flame and heat, The soft cushion broke the man's fall.
The salt breeze came across the sea.
The girl at the booth stole 50 bonds.

text: The boy was there when the sun rose, a rod is used to catch paint salmon, the source of the huge river is the clear spring, kick the ball straight and follow through, help the woman get back to her feet, a part of tea helps to pass the evening, smokey fires lack flame and heat, The soft cushion broke the man's fall. The salt breeze came across the sea. The girl at the booth stole 50 bonds.
